entry.title: [GRA7][WebPaaS] - Routine Maintenance

Nov 25, 09:35 UTC

Service impact : A short downtime will be experienced. Integrations and webhooks may fail during the maintenance, and you may notice increased deployment times.

Nov 25, 10:06 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 22/11/2022 11:00 UTC
End Time : 24/11/2022 16:00 UTC
Root cause : Incident due to a software update on the infrastructure.
Current status : Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Nov 24, 08:51 UTC
Update - The pre-produced solution implemented did not give conclusive results. Our teams are working on other solutions to make the service optimally operational.

Nov 23, 15:39 UTC
Update - We are observing some improvement on the connection to the mailboxes, we keep this incident under observation.

We will come back to you when there is an update.

Nov 22, 13:33 UTC
Update - Our technical teams have set up a pre-prod fix, if the results are conclusive, we will continue with the final fix.

Nov 22, 11:06 UTC
Investigating - Service impact : We are experiencing difficulties connecting to mailboxes due to an authentication problem
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [Global][VoIP] - ATA191/SPA112 Cisco phone firware update
entry.content:
Nov 24, 01:39 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Nov 23, 00:21 UTC
Update - The park planned for today went according to expectations.
We will continue the maintenance on the next day.

Nov 22, 02:00 UTC
Update - The park planned for today went according to expectations.
We will continue the maintenance on the next day.

Nov 17, 22:46 UTC
Update - The 25% of the park planned for today went according to expectations.
We will continue the maintenance the 21/11/2022 at 21:00 UTC till the 22/11/2022 at 02:00 UTC.

Nov 17, 22:45 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Nov 17, 22:41 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 17/11/2022 21:00 UTC
End time : 24/11/2022 02:00 UTC
Service impact : A few minute of unavailability during the intervention for the 21th, 22th and 23th of the month
Service improvement : We need to upgrade Cisco CP8861 phone's firmware.
It will be rolled out as describe :
25% of the park the 17th at 22:45 UTC
70% of the park the 21st at 02:00 UTC
100% of the park the 24th at 02:00 UTC
